籤詩版本二:
Ịdị nwayọọ na-emeri ike site n'oge ochie, ọnụ ụzọ nke ezi omume na-agakwa nke ọma.
Ọ bụrụ na mmadụ akọwa hexagram a, ọ ga-adị ka izute Yaojing mgbe akpịrị na-akpọ gị nkụ.
詩意:
Nke a hexagram bụ ihe ịrịba ama nke obiọma na ịdị nwayọọ.
N'ihe niile, nkwekọ bụ ụkpụrụ.
解曰: Eluigwe na ụwa nwere mmetụta. Ezigbo eziokwu. Chukwu na Buda chebe gi. Echefula ihe ị nwetara.
籤詩故事一:
◇Renzong matara nne ya
Iko Song Zhenzong, Concubine Liu, nwere ekworo maka ọmụmụ Concubine Li mụrụ nwa nwoke, bụ Zhao Zhen, ma nye nwanyị midwi aka ka ọ were nwamba akpụkpọ anụ dochie nwa Concubine Li. ụlọ oyi.Enwere ike idobe iko nwanyị Liu.
Mgbe e buliri iko De n'ọkwá eze ukwu, Concubine De gbara ọkụ n'obí oyi wee zubere igbu iko Li.
Iko-nwanyị Li tụbara Zhao Zhen na mbụ n'ime osimiri ahụ, mana ọ dabara nke ọma, ọnaozi ahụ napụtara ya wee ziga ya n'obí nke ndị Sages asatọ. Mgbe o tolitere, ọ nọchiri Song Renzong.
Ka oge na-aga, Bao Zheng (Bao Qingtian) zutere Concubine Li kpuru na mberede. A tụbara iko Liu n'obí oyi, a nabatakwa iko Liu n'obí ahụ, akụkọ ahụ biri nke ọma.
聖意: Ụlọ na ụlọ dị mma maka onwe ya, maka akụ na ụba, maka azụmahịa, maka alụmdi na nwunye, maka alụmdi na nwunye, maka ndị nwoke na-agafe agafe, maka igbochi ubi, maka silkworm, maka mgbụsị akwụkwọ, maka anụmanụ isii, maka anụmanụ isii, ịchọta ndị mmadụ, ịhụ ndị mmadụ. , maka ikpe ikpe, maka ịga nke ọma, maka mbata, maka ihe onwunwe furu efu, maka ọrịa Eastern, maka ngọzi, maka ili ugwu, na maka ọwụwa anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ.
第X籤: Lọtrị mmeri nke iri anọ na ise
